abstract: The move is part of an introduction of JPMorgan’s branding strategy, formally giving separate identities to the consumer and institutional businesses.
snippet: The move is part of an introduction of JPMorgan’s branding strategy, formally giving separate identities to the consumer and institutional businesses.
lead_paragraph: On the first weekend in June, JPMorgan Chase began phasing out the Bear Stearns name  beginning with the Midtown Manhattan headquarters of the firm it acquired May 31.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Stately Old Logo Returns for Institutional Business
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan’s Stately Old Logo Returns for Institutional Business

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
